title: Beto O’Rourke, Greg Abbott Raise Millions of Dollars in Texas Governor Race
sub_head: Candidates in other competitive states including New York release information on early fundraising hauls
body:
Gubernatorial candidates in Texas and New York reported big fundraising hauls Tuesday, signaling the start to an expensive election year across many U.S. states.
Beto O’Rourke, a former U.S. representative and one-time Democratic presidential hopeful now vying to become the governor of Texas, raised $7.2 million since he announced his bid, his campaign said Tuesday.
